SELECT /* FSMC0030.SEARCH00.자산처분명세서 조회 처리 */ SF_GET_COMMNAME('ASCH_GUBN', A.ASCH_GUBN) AS ASCH_GUBN /*변동구분[ASCH_GUBN]*/ ,C.ASCL_NAME /*자산분류명*/ ,C.LARG_NAME /*품목(대분류)명*/ ,A.ASST_NUMB /*자산번호*/ ,B.ASST_NAME /*자산명*/ ,SF_GET_DEPTNAME(A.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NAME /*부서명*/ ,A.CHNG_DATE /*변동일*/ ,A.ACQU_ENDX /*취득가_기말잔액*/ ,A.DPCT_ENDX /*충당금_기말잔액*/ ,A.UNDP_BALE /*미상각잔액*/ ,A.DSPS_AMOT /*처분가액*/ ,A.DSPS_GILS /*처분손익*/ ,A.SLIP_NUMB /*전표번호*/ ,A.DESC_REMK /*비고(100)*/ FROM FS_ASCHXM A INNER JOIN FS_ASSTXM B ON A.ASST_NUMB = B.ASST_NUMB INNER JOIN VI_ASSETCLASS C ON B.CLSF_CODE = C.SMAL_CODE INNER JOIN TM_CODEXD D ON A.ASCH_GUBN = D.COMD_CODE AND D.COMM_CODE = 'ASCH_GUBN' AND D.REF2_FILD = 'DSPS'/*(매각,부분매각,폐기,부분폐기,기증)*/
WHERE A.RCGN_YSNO = '1' /*승인상태가승인것*/ AND C.ASST_GUBN = NVL(#ASST_GUBN#, C.ASST_GUBN) /*고정/부외*/ AND A.CHNG_DATE BETWEEN NVL(#CHNG_DAT1#, A.CHNG_DATE) AND NVL(#CHNG_DAT2#, A.CHNG_DATE) /* 변동일자 */
A.ASCH_GUBN = NVL(#ASCH_GUBN#, A.ASCH_GUBN) /*변동구분*/
C.ASCL_CODE = NVL(#ASCL_CODE#, C.ASCL_CODE) /*자산분류*/
B.CLSF_CODE = NVL(#CLSF_CODE#, B.CLSF_CODE) /*품목분류*/
A.DEPT_CODE = NVL(#DEPT_CODE#, A.DEPT_CODE) /*부서*/
ORDER BY ASCH_GUBN, C.ASCL_NAME, C.LARG_NAME
